group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study. This study was approved by the Institutional Ethics Committee of Savitribai Phule Pune University. This article does not contain any studies with animals performed by any of the authors. All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5). Consent was taken from each participant for use of their data for academic research.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interest.
